# `morphir gleam generate`

- **Usage**: `morphir gleam generate [FLAGS]`

Generate Gleam code from Morphir IR

## Flags

### `-i --input <INPUT>`

Path to the Morphir IR file or directory

### `-o --output <OUTPUT>`

Output directory

### `--config <CONFIG>`

Explicit config file path

### `--project <PROJECT>`

Project name (for workspaces)
